definition: to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: The anti-virus software of this computer was pre-installed.
sentences.chinese: 這臺計算機的殺毒軟件是預裝的。

sentences.english: This is the stock quotes. This is an anti-virus software.
sentences.chinese: 這是股票報價信息表，這是一個殺毒軟件。

sentences.english: Controlled trial version of antivirus software client will be regarded as a virus killing.
sentences.chinese: 試用版的受控端會被殺毒軟件當作是病毒查殺。

sentences.english: T : I want to download an anti-virus software.
sentences.chinese: 我想去下載一個殺毒軟件。

sentences.english: You have to install an anti-virus software on your computer.
sentences.chinese: 你必須在電腦上安裝一個殺毒軟件。

sentences.english: Is anti-virus software necessary for a PC?
sentences.chinese: 對於電腦，殺毒軟件是必需的嗎？

sentences.english: Update your passwords and antivirus software regularly.
sentences.chinese: 定期更新您的密碼和殺毒軟件。

sentences.english: Do you know how the world's first antivirus software is birthed ?
sentences.chinese: 你知道世界上第一個殺毒軟件是如何誕生的嗎？

sentences.english: Oh, yes, it was infected by a virus, and you had no antivirus software.
sentences.chinese: 哦，是的，它感染病毒了，你沒有裝殺毒軟件啊？

sentences.english: Why is my genuine antivirus software can not kill the virus U disk?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼我的正版殺毒軟件殺不了U盤病毒？

sentences.english: You'd better keep your anti-virus software updated regularly.
sentences.chinese: 你最好定期更新你的殺毒軟件。

sentences.english: Install anti-virus software on your computer and keep it updated.
sentences.chinese: 在電腦上安裝殺毒軟件，經常更新病毒庫。

definition: CD or DVD Drive/abbr. for 光盤驅動器|光盘驱动器
(of a mobile app) to crash on startup/to crash
please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
see the opportunity and act (idiom); to act according to circumstances/to play it by ear/to use one's discretion
